Reference

All functions

DailyCatch

Daily fish catch data

DvNF_gauge()

calculate DvNF for measured flow/gauge height data

DvNF_model()

calculate DvNF for modelled flow/gauge height data

ES_DFC()

Calculate the Ecosystem Service for daily fish catch using Method 2 and a single threshold this will give a single number across multiple CFi's.

ES_DFC_M()

Calculate the Ecosystem Service for daily fish catch using Method 2 and monthly thresholds across multiple CFi's

ES_DFC_S()

Calculate the Ecosystem Service for daily fish catch using Method 2 and a single threshold this will give a single number for a single CFi.

ES_DFC_SM()

Calculate the Ecosystem Service for daily fish catch using Method 2 and monthly thresholds for a single CFi \ Station

ES_M1()

Calculate the Ecosystem Service Indicator using Method 1

ES_M2()

Calculate the Ecosystem Service Indicator using Method 2

ES_test

Ecosystem Service data

EV_TN()

Calculate the Ecosystem Vitality Water Quality Indicator for Total Nitrogen using Method 2

EV_TP()

Calculate the Ecosystem Vitality Water Quality Indicator for Total Phosphorus using Method 2

EV_TSS()

Calculate the Ecosystem Vitality Water Quality Indicator for Total Suspended Solids where thresholds are unknown using Method 2

EV_WQ()

Calculate the Ecosystem Vitality Water Quality Indicator for a parameter within lower and upper bounds using Method 2

EV_WQU()

Calculate the Ecosystem Vitality Water Quality Indicator for parameters with undefined thresholds using Method 2

EV_pH()

Calculate the Ecosystem Vitality Water Quality Indicator for pH using Method 2

KL_MOD

Modelled flow/guage height data

PK_HT

Measured flow/gauge height data

Summary_stats()

Summary statistics

Wq3S_Cam

Water quality data
